Details:
* **Type**: string
* Provide the name of the additional software package to be installed on the nodes.

* **Type**: string
* Provide the type of the additional software package.
* **Example**: ``image``, ``rpm``
Provide the public URL from which the package will be downloaded.
If the package is present locally, add the path to it in this variable.

* **Type**: string
* This variable is only applicable for ``image`` type.
* Contains the digest value of the image being pulled from the external repository.

* **Type**: string
* This variable is only applicable for ``image`` type.
* Contains the tag of the additional software image.

* Indicates whether the listed cluster nodes will be rebooted post software package installation or not.
* **Accepted values**: ``true`` or ``false``
* **Default value**: ``false``
